subject: Baseball
Wages and Salaries
lead_paragraph: Tim Lincecum, a two-time Cy Young Award winner, and San Francisco Giants reached verbal agreement on a contract Tuesday for two-years, $40.5 million, according to a club official.
snippet: Tim Lincecum, a two-time Cy Young Award winner, and San Francisco Giants reached verbal agreement on a contract Tuesday for two-years, $40.5 million, according to a club official.
